resources.string: I do not have a high temperature or a new continuous cough
I have a high temperature and/or a new continuous cough
I have a confirmed diagnosis of Coronavirus (COVID-19) by the NHS
Share your status anonymously to help people who has been in close proximity in recent days? No personal information or location data is ever collected or shared.
Status has been shared anonymously. Thank you for helping people who has been in close proximity in recent days.
Cannot submit status update. No internet connection. Please try again later.
Cannot submit status update. Device has not been registered. Please reinstall app and try again. Sorry for the inconvenience.
No report of COVID-19 symptoms, confirmed diagnosis, or potential infection has been received from people who has been in close proximity in recent days.
People who has been in close proximity in recent days have self-reported COVID-19 symptoms, confirmed diagnosis, or potential infection.
COVID-19 is now under control, you can safely return to your normal activities.
COVID-19 is now under control, you can safely return to your normal activities. Although your recent contacts may be infectious, you are unlikely to be infected from the brief encounters.
Everyone must stay at home to help stop the spread of COVID-19.
Everyone must stay at home to help stop the spread of COVID-19. Although your recent contacts may be infectious, you are unlikely to be infected from the brief encounters.
Do not leave your home if you have symptoms or confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19 or been in prolonged close contact with someone who does.
An internet connection is required for app setup on first use. Please try again later.
Connection to server is required for app setup on first use. Please try again later.
Bluetooth is not available on this device. This app needs Bluetooth to find other users in close proximity.
Bluetooth must be enabled for this app to detect other users in close proximity. Please try again.
This app does not track your location but permission is required to enable Bluetooth. Please try again.
This app uses Bluetooth to detect other users in close proximity. It does not use GPS tracking and your location is never recorded or shared. This permission is only required to enable Bluetooth.
